snippet: The boy, believed to be the youngest person convicted of terrorism offenses in Britain, plotted to behead police officers at a military parade.
abstract: Fifteen-year-old British teenager is sentenced to five years in prison on terrorism charges for planning to behead police officers at Australian military parade commemorating Battle of Gallipoli; is believed to be youngest person ever convicted of terrorism in Britain.
lead_paragraph: The boy, believed to be the youngest person convicted of terrorism offenses in Britain, plotted to behead police officers at a military parade.

headline.main: British Teenager Sentenced in Plot to Kill Police on Anzac Day in Australia
headline.print_headline: British Boy, 15, Guilty in Terror Plot, Gets 5 Years
